title: The New Medibang Pro Hands On
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

Medibang Pro just kind of came out of nowhere. It's a new interface for the free drawing app Medibang and it's a huge usability upgrade and makes it feel like Procreate. The downside is that it's only on iPad OS right now.

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClozNP-QPyVatzpGKC25s0A/join
